name: GrayscaleErodeImageFilter
doc: Performs Erode in a grayscale image.

members.name: KernelRadius
members.detaileddescriptionSet: Set the radius of the kernel structuring element.
members.detaileddescriptionGet: Get the radius of the kernel structuring element.

members.name: KernelType
members.custom_itk_cast:
auto kernel = CreateKernel<InputImageType::ImageDimension>( m_KernelType, m_KernelRadius );
  filter->SetKernel( kernel );
members.detaileddescriptionSet: Set the kernel or structuring element used for the morphology.
members.detaileddescriptionGet: Get the kernel or structuring element used for the morphology.

detaileddescription:
Erode an image using grayscale morphology. Erosion takes the maximum of all the pixels identified by the structuring element.

The structuring element is assumed to be composed of binary values (zero or one). Only elements of the structuring element having values > 0 are candidates for affecting the center pixel.

\see MorphologyImageFilter , GrayscaleFunctionErodeImageFilter , BinaryErodeImageFilter
